title: Cover Picture and Issue Information
content: Cover image: A red kite overwintering in the breeding areas of Switzerland after migrating several winters at young age. Individuals of the partial migrant species show a plastic migration behaviour. They start as migrants and change to residents during their ontogeny. The study Sex and size shape the ontogeny of partial migration shows that large females become resident at an earlier age than small females and that old migrant males incur increased survival costs. Photo: Valentijn van Bergen, vs.vanbergen@gmail.com.
